Uses of Interface
com.magnet.context.api.ContextBuilder

  • Packages that use ContextBuilder 
    Package Description
    com.magnet.context.api  

    • Uses of ContextBuilder in com.magnet.context.api

      Methods in com.magnet.context.api that return ContextBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ContextBuilder ContextBuilder.attribute(Context.Type type, String key, Object value)
      Add an attribute to the context.
      ContextBuilder ContextBuilder.attributes(Context.Type type, Map<String,Object> attributes)
      Add attributes to the context.
      ContextBuilder ContextService.createBuilder()
      Retrieves a builder appropriate for context building.
      ContextBuilder ContextBuilder.id(String id)
      Set the UUID of the context instance.
      ContextBuilder ContextBuilder.parent(Context curCtx)
      Sets the parent context; this should be used with extreme caution and is reserved for advanced use cases only.
      ContextBuilder ContextBuilder.user(com.magnet.api.MagnetUri userUri)
      Set the MagnetUri for the User this context relates to.
      ContextBuilder ContextBuilder.userSubject(Subject s)
      Sets the User Subject.
      Methods in com.magnet.context.api with parameters of type ContextBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ContextBuilderDecorator.decorate(ContextBuilder cb)
      This call will be called after all attributes are set and before the ContextBuilder is built into a Context.
